item.title: STL Agile Beer Night, Iteration 1 - Retrospective
item.description: Tonight we had STL Agile Beer Night, Iteration 1. It was lightly attended; I can see I’m going to have to work on the finer points of scheduling for a diverse audience. I think that next time I’ll get some sort of a poll going beforehand with a selection of different dates to see what draws the most potential attendance. Tonight’s beer night consisted of myself, Brian Button, Zac Duncan and Jim Durtschy.
